content: Liwei Wang Liwei Wang I am an Assistant Professor in Computer Science and Engineering department at The Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK). Before coming to HK, I have worked for more than two years as a Senior Researcher in Tencent America at Bellevue, US. I got my PhD from Computer Science Department, University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign (UIUC), advised by Prof. Svetlana Lazebnik. The Language and Vision (LaVi) Lab, which I founded at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at CUHK, conducts research in Language+Vision, i.e. the intersection of language and vision. If you want to join LaVi Lab, please send an email to lwwang@cse.cuhk.edu.hk Email / Google Scholar / Publications / Lab website (soon) / News We are hiring Interns and Phd students to work on Vision+Language and multi-modal LLMs. 2025/08: I will give a keynote speak at MFMSI Workshop at ACM Multimedia 2025.
